dcterms:description: The Liver Tumor Segmentation Challenge (LiTS) provides 130 CT scans with ground truth for training and 70 scans without ground truth for testing, collected from different hospitals. All the CT images are with 512×512 in-plane resolution, while slice thickness across patient scans varies. There are 116 scans containing tumors among all the 130 CT scans.
dcterms:title: Liver Tumor Segmentation Challenge dataset

dcterms:description: The Kidney Tumor Segmentation Challenge (KiTS) dataset contains 300 CT scans where 210 scans are with manual kidney tumor segmentations. All the CT images are of 512×512 in-plane resolution.
dcterms:title: Kidney Tumor Segmentation Challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: A. A. A. Setio

B. Geurts
dcterms:description: The Lung Nodule Analysis 2016 (LUNA) Challenge dataset contains annotated data for 888 patients. For each patient, there are CT images and an XML file with nodule locations on each 512 × 512 slice.
dcterms:title: Lung Nodule Analysis Challenge dataset
